review: This is a really good player with no issues at all so far.
author: L. Porro

review: The best ever!!!  I'm an "older" consumer who doesn't do well with highly technical innovations.  Fire TV Stick works perfectly for me, & the best part of all is that Amazon "speaks" (gives instructions) in a language I understand, & am not confused by!!  I love, love, love this product.
author: Georgie Mcnulty "bosmama"

review: It had no DLNA capabilities.  I returned them and bought a WDTV.

review: Looking to get another since Samsung Smart TV does not have App for this version of TV hoping for a markdown on the product to buy again

review: I am disappointed in the Fire Stick. I can get the same movies and TV shows on my Verizon Cable Account.You have to pay for TV shows with the Fire Stick...I can see them On-Demand on Verizon for free.Not very happy with this product.

review: Compact and easy to install.  Work well most of the time.  Had a few glitches but overall works well.

review: Love it! Simple to install. Great search feature. I can input an actor or director's name and it will populate the related works that are available.
author: wickedpple42

review: Liked it but had trouble with remote when I first installed it -- when I went to enter my logon information for Netflix, I found the remote would move the cursor over the keyboard on the screen on its own, as if the remote directional mover was stuck at times -- very frustrating, so I let it sit a few days and then tried again and it worked fine.I like the ease of using the fire stick over the roku, and picture is crystal clear.
author: Frank A. Edgar Jr.

review: I have them all - Roku 2 and 3, WD Live, Boxee, Smart TVs, etc., but right now I am really liking the format and presentation of the Fire TV Stick and have put those others aside.
